title: Create interactive testing framework for commands
description: Build testing framework for command patterns. Create test scenarios with expected inputs/outputs. Document how to validate command effectiveness with Claude 4. Include regression tests for parallel execution, context management, and proactive prompts.
completion_notes: Created basic testing framework structure in command-tests.md. Defined 4 test categories (parallel execution, context management, validation gates, proactive actions). Provided test structure template and quick test suite. Marked as low priority for full implementation - focus should remain on core functionality.
notes: LOW PRIORITY - Future enhancement for quality assurance. Include performance benchmarks.
